summary: People, it's not too late to restart your current lives and do what you want. You don't need to fantasize about being...
body:
People, it’s not too late to restart your current lives and do what you want. You don’t need to fantasize about being transported to alternate dimensions to live your truth. Just start today. - April 2018

you could tell he was tired and stressed but still he gave healing truth nuggets amid the bants

tags: and other things phil has said
summary: Did it hurt when you fell?
title: Did it hurt when you fell?
body:
Phil: did it hurt when you fell?
Dan: from heaven? Listen, Phil, I get that you're into me, but-
Phil: no, I meant when you fell waling in. I watched you trip on your foot and kind of lay there on the floor for about ten minutes
Dan:

dialogue.name: Phil
dialogue.label: Phil:
dialogue.phrase: did it hurt when you fell?

dialogue.name: Dan
dialogue.label: Dan:
dialogue.phrase: from heaven? Listen, Phil, I get that you're into me, but-

dialogue.name: Phil

summary: follow me (and I'll keep you safe)
body:
follow me (and I’ll keep you safe)

Words: 7,506

Warnings: anxiety, mention of vomit

Summary: People ride roller coasters to feel free. It’s a feeling we as humans actively seek out, but just like humans, these rides aren’t perfect.

This was written for @phandomficfests exchange fest. I had so much fun with this prompt! Thank you to my amazing beta @cozydnp for helping me out the whole way.

Ao3 link
